roleset.name: to leave stranded, left high and dry
roleset.note: STRANDED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from stranded.01-j)

example.name: strand-v: passive
example.text: '' Or the one in which-3 [she and Josh]-1 are stranded [*-1]in the city [*T*-3] , and , after insisting on separate motel rooms , she knocks on his door to pour out her feelings about the rape -- wearing nothing but a mini-slip and a push-up bra .

example.name: strand-v: transitive
example.text: [Bus schedules]-1 were sometimes in disarray , [*]-1 stranding commuters such as Marilyn Sullivan .

example.name: stranding-n
example.text: ...his stranding her on the boat, even if he thinks it's in her best interests, is a rather cruel deception

example.name: stranded-j
example.text: I'm stranded at the edge of the world
example.arg: at the edge of the world
